LOADING_I18N.developer_comment: Text displayed when the app is loading content.

TURN_ON_I18N.developer_comment: Text displayed on a button to turn on a feature.

CONDUIT_OFF_I18N.developer_comment: Indicates to the user that Conduit is off. The name 'Conduit' is the app name and should not be translated.

YOUR_ID_I18N.developer_comment: Text displayed to the user to indicate their Conduit ID. The name 'Conduit' is the app name and should not be translated.

ANNOUNCING_I18N.developer_comment: Text displayed while the Conduit Station is announcing it's presence to the network

SERVING_N_PEERS_I18N.developer_comment: Indicates the number of peers currently connected to the user's Conduit Station

SHUTTING_DOWN_I18N.developer_comment: Text displayed while the Conduit Station is shutting down

SETTINGS_CHANGE_WILL_RESTART_CONDUIT_DES.string: Changing Conduit settings requires restarting your Conduit Station. Any connected users will be disconnected.

ONBOARDING_WELCOME_BODY_I18N.string:
Turn your phone into an Internet Freedom badass.

You can help people around the world break through restrictive networks and access the global internet securely through the Psiphon Network.

ONBOARDING_INFO_1_BODY_I18N.string:
When you run a Conduit Station, your phone acts as a beacon of Internet Freedom.

People in censored regions will bounce through your phone and into the Psiphon Network, creating a more open internet.

ONBOARDING_PERMISSIONS_BODY_I18N.string:
Conduit recommends you enable notifications so we can provide critical updates about your Conduit Station.

Ready to begin?

ONBOARDING_PRIVACY_POLICY_BODY_I18N.string:
Before we begin, some ground rules: We do not collect any personally identifiable information from users who run Conduit Stations.

By using Conduit, you accept the entire privacy policy, available below.
